GPTTools.name: Jasper
GPTTools.detail: Jasper is an all-in-one AI writing assistant designed to generate content for you once you’ve entered a few key details about your topic.

Top Features.f: Jasper comes with Boss Mode, which lets you dictate to it as it writes for you
Comes with a paraphrase feature in case you want to restructure specific sentences
Let’s you check for plagiarism and grammar
Comes with templates for different types of writing scenarios
Lets you save your work in project folders and documents
Comes with an engaged Facebook community where users share tips and tricks
Helps you create custom images with it's AI art generator, Jasper Art.

Price.p: Starter: $45 a month for up to 35,000 words
Boss Mode: $99 a month for up to 1000,000 words

GPTTools.name: ChibiAI
GPTTools.detail: ChibiAI is designed to help you get over writer’s block and predict what you’ll write next by suggesting new ideas as you go.

Top Features.f: Comes with a responsive community that answers all your support questions
Is designed to write with you instead of generating content for you

Price.p: Get started with ChibiAI for $9.

GPTTools.name: Copysmith
GPTTools.detail: Copysmith works best for e-commerce teams that want a streamlined way to write content like product descriptions and landing page copy.

Top Features.f: Comes with a chrome extension for easy access
Bulk generate content once you upload your content spreadsheets
Comes with templates for ad copy, captions, and blog outlines
Assign content generation assignments to teams and collaborate on new projects from one place

Price.p: Starter: $99 a month for up to 33,000 words a month
Professional: $59 a month for up to 260,000 words a month
Enterprise: Contact their sales team for a quote

GPTTools.name: Kafkai
GPTTools.detail: Kafkai is a machine learning tool that writes every article from scratch without the need to scrape any digital content.

Top Features.f: The niche AI article writer feature will generate an article for you once you’ve chosen a niche
Is able to translate articles to seven languages
Designed for bulk content generation.

Price.p: Industrial Printer: $199 a month for up to 2,500 articles
Printing Press: $129 a month for up to 1,000 articles
Newsroom: $49 a month for up to 250 articles

GPTTools.name: Texta
GPTTools.detail: Texta is an AI copywriter that’s useful for creating website copy, social ads, video script, and even sales copy.

Top Features.f: Let’s you set tone, style, and how creative you’d like the writing to be
Comes with long-form generator to create blog posts
Translates copy to over 20 languages

Price.p: Starter: $29 a month for up to 50,000 words
Pro Max: $69 a month for up to 200,000 words
Pro Max Plus: $99 a month for up to 300,000 words

GPTTools.name: Frase
GPTTools.detail: Frase is designed to helps marketing teams write SEO content much quicker with its content analytics and content brief features.

Top Features.f: Can generate content briefs in a few minutes
Let’s you create and store custom templates
Autocompletes new sentences and writes entire paragraphs for you

Price.p: Basic: $44.99 a month if paid annually for 30 document credits
Team: $114.99 a month if paid annually for unlimited credits
Enterprise: Contact team for more information

GPTTools.name: Anyword
GPTTools.detail: Anyword is a copywriting AI designed to use predictive analytics to help you write better sales copy that converts.

Top Features.f: Connects to your landing page for easier content generation workflow
Includes policy compliance detection features
Can write content in 25 languages

Price.p: Data-Driven: $83 a month for 80,000 credits
Data-Driven Unlimited: $266 a month for unlimited credits
Enterprise: $999 a month

GPTTools.name: Zyro
GPTTools.detail: Zyro makes it easy to build a website or online store by generating content for you through a series of templates and text generation tools.

Top Features.f: Generate website text through niche templates or freewriting
Comes with SEO features
Generates product descriptions

Price.p: Website: $2.90 a month
Business: $4.90 a month
Advanced Store: $15.90 a month

GPTTools.name: Writesonic
GPTTools.detail: Writesonic generates Google ads, landing pages, emails and more in a matter of seconds.

Top Features.f: Lets you describe your product, set the occasion, and insert a special offer
Comes with more than 40 copy templates
Offers a Facebook community

Price.p: Free: $0 for 10 credits
Business: $4.90 a month
Economy: $25 a month for 750 credits
Professional: $45 a month for unlimited credits
Startup: $95 a month for unlimited credits

GPTTools.name: Sassbook
GPTTools.detail: Sassbook is built to help you write and summarize stories in minutes without the need to create an account.

Top Features.f: Can summarize pages of content for you
Use it to write stories with the help of AI
Lets you create content briefs

Price.p: Free: 50 words per generation
Standard: $32 a month for 70 words per generation
Premium: $49 a month for 100 words per generation

GPTTools.name: Simplified
GPTTools.detail: Simplified is an AI writer designed for marketing copy that forms part of a suite of marketing tools teams can use to streamline their workflows.

Top Features.f: Generates SEO-driven copy
More than 30 different AI marketing templates and use cases
Lets you rewrite content with one click
You can organize both teams and clients within one unified dashboard

Price.p: Free Forever for individuals
Small Teams: $12 for up to 5 team members
Business: $24 for up to 5 team members
Growth: $99 for up to 5 team members

GPTTools.name: HyperWrite
GPTTools.detail: HyperWrite is an AI copywriting tool built to generate original paragraphs once you feed it some basic information on what you’re looking for.

Top Features.f: Suggests unique phrasing and sentences as you write
Can include information from chosen sources
Useful for students and professionals

Price.p: Get started with HyperWrite for free.

GPTTools.name: Rytr
GPTTools.detail: Much like other GTP-3 tools in the space, Rytr helps you generate content faster and at an affordable price point.

Top Features.f: Lets you generate AI responses for automated chatbots, customer reviews, emails, and customer support questions
Comes with a plugin you can use in Shopify and WordPress
Its API lets you integrate it into your existing apps and workflow
Its SEO analyzer ensures you’re optimizing your copy to rank in SERPs

Price.p: Free Plan: Generate up to 5,000 characters a month
Saver Plan: $9 a month for up to 50,000 characters per month
Unlimited Plan: $29 a month for unlimited characters

GPTTools.name: Longshot
GPTTools.detail: Longshot is a robust long-form writing assistant built for content teams, marketers, writers, and editors.

Top Features.f: Comes with semantic SEO features to write competitive content that ranks
Fluent in eight languages
Comes with a unique five-step approach to blog content generation
Makes writing easier by letting you specify what niche you’re creating content for

Price.p: Basic: 10 free credits per day
Pro: $29.90 per month for 1,000 credits
Enterprise: $89.90 per month for unlimited credits

GPTTools.name: Wordtune
GPTTools.detail: Wordtune is a Chrome extension that will edit and rewrite your content as you write it whether you’re working in Google Docs or a Word document.

Top Features.f: Switch from casual to formal finetuning preferences
Let’s you change the length of your sentences as you go
Includes grammar and spelling fixes and works in Word

Price.p: Free: $0 for 10 rewrites a day
Premium: $9.99 a month for unlimited rewrites
Premium for Teams: Contact the sales team

GPTTools.name: INK
GPTTools.detail: As a Chrome extension, INK works as an SEO cowriter that enables you to produce high quality content that’s optimized and unique to you.

Top Features.f: Comes with writing scores for different writing criteria
Analyzes your SEO competition to inform you on how to outrank them
Helps you generate clickable headlines

Price.p: Team SEO Unlimited: $177 per month billed annually for unlimited ink points
Pro SEO: $44 per month billed annually for 444 ink points
Starter: $8 per month billed annually for 222 ink points
